name: AGRUPACIÓN DE FABRICANTES DE CEMENTO DE ESPAÑA
legal: AGRUPACIÓN DE FABRICANTES DE CEMENTO DE ESPAÑA
goal:
Our mission is being in the market and acting in it to create work and prosperity and to contribute to the advance of society and the quality of life of the general public. For this reason, we commit to leadership, innovation, accountability with the communities where we are involved and respect for the environment.

We try to position ourselves as a modern and efficient sector, a national and international benchmark and respectful of people. We commit to innovation and sustainable development as well, working in close collaboration with public authorities, social partners and other industrial sectors and making a dynamic contribution to the Spanish economy.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
CE marking for in situ concrete barriers for roads
Horizon 2020
Consultation on revision of the EU Emission Trading System (EU ETS) Directive
